name: Feature Evaluation Plugin
title: Feature Evaluation Plugin
description: Plugin to generate evaluation metrics for feature comparison of ground truth and predicted images.
author: Vishakha Goyal (vishakha.goyal@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: GTDir
inputs.description: Ground truth feature collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: PredDir
inputs.description: Predicted feature collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: combineLabels
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate number of bins for histogram by combining GT and Predicted Labels. Default is using GT labels only.

inputs.name: outFileFormat
inputs.description: Boolean to save output file as csv. Default is lz4.

inputs.name: singleCSV
inputs.description: Boolean to save output file as a single csv. Default is true.

ui.title: Ground Truth Features
ui.description: Ground truth feature collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Predicted Features
ui.description: Predicted feature collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Combine Labels
ui.description: Boolean to calculate number of bins for histogram by combining GT and Predicted Labels. Default is using GT labels only.

ui.title: singleCSV
ui.description: Boolean to save output file as a single csv. Default is true.

ui.title: Output File Format
ui.description: Boolean to save output file as csv. Default is lz4.
